subject: refactor(layout): reorder sections for visitor engagement
body:
Hero → Projects → About → Skills → Experience → Education →
PortfolioCallout → Contact.

Lead with projects (show don't tell), personality and skills for
context, then credentials. Portfolio CTA moved after engagement
instead of before visitors know who they're looking at.

Tags: ux, layout
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: cv-layout
Semver: minor
